channel.title: TheBerrics wants to hear your music!
channel.description:
Opportunity - If anyone interested/been into skateboarding culture kinda thing, maybe this is your chance!
(Keep in mind that Skateboarding is heavy influence by HipHop, Rock music and etc genre when comes to skate videos. But nowdays its just anyones game ðŸ˜‰, you could as well influenced them by your music)
TheBerrics wants to listen to your music!
Shoot them your tracks link using email provided in the photo.
Headquarters: 2535 East 12th Street Los Angeles, California, United States
More Info on TheBerric:- [http://theberrics.com/](http://theberrics.com/)
Playlist Section at TheBerrics:- [http://theberrics.com/playlist/](http://theberrics.com/playlist/)

item.title: TheBerrics wants to hear your music!
item.dc:creator: cgedius
item.description:
Opportunity - If anyone interested/been into skateboarding culture kinda thing, maybe this is your chance!

(Keep in mind that Skateboarding is heavy influence by HipHop, Rock music and etc genre when comes to skate videos. But nowdays its just anyones game , you could as well influenced them by your music)

TheBerrics wants to listen to your music!

Shoot them your tracks link using email provided in the photo.

Headquarters: 2535 East 12th Street
Los Angeles, California, United States

More Info on TheBerric:-
http://theberrics.com/

Playlist Section at TheBerrics:-
http://theberrics.com/playlist/
